title: Ariat Men's FR M5 Straight DuraStretch Truckee Stackable Straight Leg Jean
description: STACKABLE STRAIGHT LEG: These straight-leg jeans are slim through the seat and thigh with a low rise and will keep you comfortable all day long. Show off your classy boots with the stackable design, creating a perfect over-the-boot silhouette
PREMIUM FEATURES: These men’s jeans have a fashionable back pocket with stitch detail and anchored belt loops for easy use of the belt to ensure that it stays in place without slipping off
FIRE RESISTANT: These straight leg jeans for men are fire resistant, giving you an added sense of security while on the job site

MADE TO LAST: Made using DuraStretch ring-spun denim, these blue jeans are durable combined with proven flame resistant technology. They are made to last and create a western-style statement that cowboys are known for

SCIENCE OF INNOVATION: Ariat excels in advanced technologies to deliver products that outperform in various conditions. Partnering with world-class biomechanical research groups and testing labs, Ariat strives to improve performance, comfort, and durability

Ride, ranch, or hit the town with the Ariat’s Men’s FR M5 Slim DuraStretch Straight Leg Jeans. Featuring a design that is low rise and slim through the seat and thigh, these slim stretch jeans are comfortable and durable western jeans that will create an authentic statement. Made in Mexico using premium quality DuraStretch ring-spun denim, the straight leg design brings a modern twist to classic fashion. They also feature anchored belt loops, no-rub inseams for rash-proof wearing comfort and are fitted with a fashion back pocket with stitch detail for an attractive appeal that even adds more character. Since they are designed with a stackable design, pair them with your favorite boots to create over-the-boot silhouettes. Ariat is a leader in developing advanced technologies to deliver products that outperform in a variety of demanding environments. The brand partners with world-class biomechanical research groups and testing labs to improve product performance, comfort, and durability while focusing on real-world product functionality. Ariat works with global suppliers to develop new materials that are lighter, cooler, and more durable than anything in the market. The brand field-tests all of its products to consistently raise the bar for functionality and style. Here at Ariat, we are committed to delivering performance footwear and clothing with an emphasis on technology and innovation. Today, Ariat’s world-class product team builds innovative and award-winning performance products for all types of outdoor and work environments.
